column5: At the moment I’m doing pretty good! I went to a pretty sunny vacation with jus quiet nature. But I can feel the anxious thoughts creep back up. But I’ve learn to manage pretty well through therapy and just putting myself first. But it’s just how my mind works, so accepting that some days will suck kinda takes the edge off.

I feel ya, just to have a day to feel as a normal person.
If it helps , I’ve learned to meditate and it helps stop my mind even for five mins. I prayed for months if not years to have peace and I’m great full for those five minute I can achieve.
